title: Understanding Mental Health
text: Mental health refers to more than just the absence of mental disorders. It encompasses emotional, psychological, and social well-being.

title: Characteristics of Mental Health
text: Consider how mental health allows individuals to handle stress, work productively, and contribute to their community.

hintAnswer: a state of $$well-being$$ in which individuals realize their own abilities, cope with the normal stresses of life, work productively, and contribute to their community.
title: Defining Mental Health
text: What is the definition of mental health?
choices: a state of $$well-being$$ in which individuals realize their own abilities, cope with the normal stresses of life, work productively, and contribute to their community.
a health condition involving changes in emotion, thinking, or behavior associated with emotional distress and problems functioning in social, work, or family activities
a term used in psychiatry to diagnose and treat patients
